import React from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components' import { InnerLayout } from '../../styles/Layouts'; import Chart from '../chart/Chart'; import { useGlobalContext } from '../../context/GlobalContext'; import { dollar } from '../../utils/Icons'; function Dashboard() { const {totalExpense, totalIncome} = useGlobalContext() return (

All Transactions

Total Income

{dollar} {totalIncome()}

Total Expense

{dollar} {totalExpense()}

Total Balance

 ) } const DashboardStyled = styled.div` `; export default Dashboard
